00014 #ifndef GNU_PLOT_DUMP_H
00015 #define GNU_PLOT_DUMP_H
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"
00018 
00019 namespace GnuPlotDump {
00020 
00027 template<class ITERATOR>
00028 class gp_dumper {
00029 public:
00030  
00031    enum dump_type {
00032       gnuplot = 0,
00033       vector_gnuplot = 1,
00034       octave = 2
00035    };
00036    
00037    gp_dumper( const ITERATOR& begin,
00038               const ITERATOR& end,
00039               dump_type dumpType ) :
00040          m_begin(begin),
00041          m_end(end),
00042          m_dumpType( dumpType ) {}
00043 
00044    friend ostream& operator<<( ostream& o, const gp_dumper& dumper ) {
00045       switch ( dumper.m_dumpType ) {
00046          case ( gnuplot ):
00047          {
00048             // Lines - format "x y"
00049             for ( ITERATOR i = dumper.m_begin; i != dumper.m_end; ++i ) {
00050                o << GfxUtil::getCoordX( *i ) << " "
00051                  << GfxUtil::getCoordY( *i ) << endl;
00052             }
00053             break;
00054          }
00055          case ( vector_gnuplot ):
00056          {
00057             // Dump for vector plotting. Format "x y d_x d_y"
00058             for ( ITERATOR i = dumper.m_begin; i != dumper.m_end;  ) {
00059                int32 curX = GfxUtil::getCoordX( *i );
00060                int32 curY = GfxUtil::getCoordY( *i );
00061                ++i;
00062                if ( i == dumper.m_end ) {
00063                   // No more data
00064                   return o;
00065                }
00066                int32 dX = GfxUtil::getCoordX( *i ) - curX;
00067                int32 dY = GfxUtil::getCoordY( *i ) - curY;
00068                o << curX << " " << curY << " " << dX << " " << dY << endl;
00069             }
00070             break;
00071          }
00072          case ( octave ):
00073          {
00074             o << "x = [";
00075             // Lines - format "x y"
00076             for ( ITERATOR i = dumper.m_begin; i != dumper.m_end; ++i ) {
00077                o << GfxUtil::getCoordX( *i ) << " ";
00078             }
00079             o << " ];" << endl;
00080             o << "y = [";
00081             // Lines - format "x y"
00082             for ( ITERATOR i = dumper.m_begin; i != dumper.m_end; ++i ) {
00083                o << GfxUtil::getCoordY( *i ) << " ";
00084             }
00085             o << " ];" << endl;
00086             break;
00087          }
00088       }
00089       return o;
00090    }
00091    
00092 private:
00093    ITERATOR m_begin;
00094    ITERATOR m_end;
00095    dump_type m_dumpType;
00096 };
00097 
00098 template<class ITERATOR>
00099 gp_dumper<ITERATOR>
00100 gp_dump( const ITERATOR& begin,
00101          const ITERATOR& end ) {
00102    return gp_dumper<ITERATOR>( begin, end,
00103                                gp_dumper<ITERATOR>::gnuplot );
00104 }
00105 
00106 template<class ITERATOR>
00107 gp_dumper<ITERATOR>
00108 gp_vec_dump( const ITERATOR& begin,
00109              const ITERATOR& end ) {
00110    return gp_dumper<ITERATOR>( begin, end,
00111                                gp_dumper<ITERATOR>::vector_gnuplot );
00112 }
00113 
00114 template<class ITERATOR>
00115 gp_dumper<ITERATOR>
00116 octave_dump( const ITERATOR& begin,
00117              const ITERATOR& end ) {
00118    return gp_dumper<ITERATOR>( begin, end,
00119                                gp_dumper<ITERATOR>::octave );
00120 }
00121 
00122 }
00123 #endif
